hero.title: Saneatsu Blog
hero.description: Articles about programming, development tools, and daily insights on technology and lifestyle.

profile.title: About Saneatsu
profile.description: As a full-stack developer, I work on product development using modern web technologies. I aim to create software that provides value to users, and I continue to learn and practice every day.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.description: Technologies I use and fields I'm interested in

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.skills: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite

backend.title: Backend
backend.skills: Node.js, Hono, Drizzle ORM, PostgreSQL, SQLite

tools.title: Development Tools
tools.skills: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Cloudflare Workers, Docker

current.title: Current Activities
current.description: Through personal project development, I focus on learning new technologies and practicing best practices.

focus.title: Areas of Focus
focus.description: I'm particularly interested in modern web application development, performance optimization, and improving developer experience.

interests.title: Interests & Hobbies
interests.description: Areas of interest outside of technology

tech.title: Tech Trends
tech.description: I'm interested in trends of new frameworks and tools, and contributing to open-source projects.

life.title: Lifestyle
life.description: I value creative thinking and refreshment through reading, watching movies, and taking walks.
